title: Brand Ultimate is bugged

embed.description: Uploaded by nemam ti kad on 2016-01-31.

body: Hello , the last 3 days i have been playing brand and i noticed his ultimate is bugged , it does not bounce at all when it sould , this thing does not happen all the time but it happend to me like 50% of time i used ult in the last game. Attached is a link on youtube from another person who got the bug on video , the same thing happens to me. Thanks and hope you solve this.

replies.body: There's been a fix on the PBE for a week and fifty threads already reporting this.
Hi , I'm glad to hear that. Thanks for the prompt response

Hey ProfessorLava! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue - you should see a fix in 6.3. ^-^
I did not play for like 3 months and i started playing again like 3-4 days ago and its been like that since , i did not know about the pbe fix. Anyways , hope they will solve this/
